activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#10520
activity.text:
I think the issue is happening because the `/previous/` route is getting added to the request URL, which is causing the 'Not Found' error. I believe the fix might be in `QuestionnaireSearch.tsx`, `QuestionnaireApi.ts`, and `QuestionnaireForm.tsx`, but I wanted to confirm if I'm on the right track. Could you help clarify how the URLs are being formed? Also, any guidance on how to move forward would be great! ü§î

CC: @rithviknishad

```
docker compose exec backend bash -c "python manage.py test --keepdb --parallel --shuffle"

Found 427 test(s).
Using existing test database for alias 'default'...

    output = self.handle(*args, **options)

    failures = test_runner.run_tests(test_labels)
  File "/.venv/lib/python3.13/site-packages/django/test/runner.py", line 1066, in run_tests
    old_config = self.setup_databases(
        aliases=databases,
        serialized_aliases=suite.serialized_aliases,
    )
  File "/.venv/lib/python3.13/site-packages/django/test/runner.py", line 964, in setup_databases
    return _setup_databases(
        self.verbosity,
    ...<5 lines>...
        **kwargs,
    )
  File "/.venv/lib/python3.13/site-packages/django/test/utils.py", line 206, in setup_databases
    connection.creation.create_test_db(
    ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~^
        verbosity=verbosity,

    output = self.handle(*args, **options)
```
